languages.text: "Я ищу в муках спасенья от скверны, что впилась в естество мое, заслонив его от Твоего света".

traits.locale_text: "Я жажду спасенья от скверны, что впилась в естество мое, заслонив его от Твоего света. Желаю отринуть я ересь, искупив свои деяния муками".

languages.text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
languages.original_text: "Я ищу в муках спасенья от скверны, что впилась в естество мое, заслонив его от Твоего света".

traits.locale_text: "In my torment I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
"In my torment I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
"In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
"In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
"In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
"In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."

languages.text: “我在痛苦中寻求救赎。腐化之物攫住了我的灵魂，玷污了您的明光，我渴望您的净化。”
languages.original_text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."

traits.locale_text: “我在痛苦中寻求救赎。腐化之物攫住了我的灵魂，玷污了您的明光，我渴望您的净化。”

languages.text: 「苦痛の中で、{mf|俺|私}は腐敗からの救いを求める。腐敗は己の本質を失わせ、主の光さえも心から盗んでしまった」
languages.original_text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."

traits.locale_text: 「苦痛の中で、{mf|俺|私}は腐敗からの救いを求める。腐敗は己の本質を失わせ、主の光さえも心から盗んでしまった」

languages.text: «En mi tormento, busco la salvación de la corrupción que se ha apoderado de mi esencia, eclipsando Su luz en mí».
languages.original_text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."

traits.locale_text: «En mi tormento, busco la salvación de la corrupción que se ha apoderado de mi esencia, eclipsando Su luz en mí».

languages.text: "In meinen Qualen suche ich Erlösung von der Verderbnis, die meine Essenz ergriffen hat und mir Euer Licht entzieht."
languages.original_text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."

traits.locale_text: "In meinen Qualen suche ich Erlösung von der Verderbnis, die meine Essenz ergriffen hat und mir Euer Licht entzieht."

languages.text: « Dans mon tourment, je cherche le salut de mon essence étouffée par la corruption qui éclipse Votre lumière. »
languages.original_text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."

traits.locale_text: « Dans mon tourment, je cherche le salut de mon essence étouffée par la corruption qui éclipse Votre lumière. »

languages.text: "Şu çektiğim eziyetle, özümü sarıp senin nurundan beni mahrum bırakan bu yozluktan kurtuluş ararım."
languages.original_text: "In my torment, I seek salvation from the corruption that has gripped my essence, eclipsing Your light from me."
